H0.text: What spirit is added to tomato juice to make a Bloody Maria. Tequila

H1.text: What spirit is added to tomato juice to make a Bloody Maria. Mezcal

H2.text: What spirit is added to tomato juice to make a Bloody Maria. Gin

H3.text: What spirit is added to tomato juice to make a Bloody Maria. Mixtos

A5.text: With tequila, it is often called a Bloody Maria
